characters: Driver of a white SUV, driver of a green truck
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on an urban road. A white SUV is ahead, moving slightly to the right lane. A green truck is visible further ahead in the same lane. The road is wet, indicating recent rain.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a consistent speed while following the white SUV. The SUV moves slightly to the right lane, possibly to overtake the green truck ahead. The self-driving vehicle keeps a safe distance from both the SUV and the truck.
key_objects: 1) Front: A white SUV, approximately 15 meters away, moving slightly to the right lane, possibly overtaking the green truck. 2) Front: A green truck, approximately 30 meters away, moving slowly in the same lane.
